text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8ec92c977976d9e9225183e36a80e6b0cdbf1f51|patch 8.2.1775: MS-Windows: adding a long quickfix list is slow>
patch 8.2.1775: MS-Windows: adding a long quickfix list is slow

Problem:    MS-Windows: adding a long quickfix list is slow.
Solution:   Shorten the buffer name only for the first entry. (Yegappan
            Lakshmanan, closes #7039, closes #7033)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1775: MS-Windows: adding a long quickfix list is slow · vim/vim@8ec92c9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1775: MS-Windows: adding a long quickfix list is slow · vim/vim@8ec92c9
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: adding a long quickfix list is slow. Solution: Shorten the buffer name only for the first entry. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #7039, closes #7033)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/32fbc4f247a31e35ade0939542e11aa033a2554f|patch 8.2.1774: GTK: hang when forced to exit>
patch 8.2.1774: GTK: hang when forced to exit

Problem:    GTK: hang when forced to exit.
Solution:   Do not clean up "mainwin" when really_exiting is set.
            (Zdenek Dohnal, closes #7042)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1774: GTK: hang when forced to exit · vim/vim@32fbc4f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1774: GTK: hang when forced to exit · vim/vim@32fbc4f
attachments.text: Problem: GTK: hang when forced to exit. Solution: Do not clean up "mainwin" when really_exiting is set. (Zdenek Dohnal, closes #7042)

patch 8.2.1773: crash when calling mapset() with a list as first argument

Problem:    Crash when calling mapset() with a list as first argument.
Solution:   Check for NULL. (closes #7040)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f43e7ac4eee22dbb26fc069ec9a3d1598ec8dfe9|patch 8.2.1772: cannot use CTRL-W <Down> to move out of a terminal wi…>
patch 8.2.1772: cannot use CTRL-W  to move out of a terminal window

Problem:    Cannot use CTRL-W  to move out of a terminal window.
Solution:   Use special_to_buf() instead of mb_char2bytes(). (closes #7045)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1772: cannot use CTRL-W  to move out of a terminal wi… · vim/vim@f43e7ac
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1772: cannot use CTRL-W  to move out of a terminal wi… · vim/vim@f43e7ac

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/391c36279415d0b8c5dba1ba11b668add04be963|patch 8.2.1771: synIDattr() cannot get the value of ctermul>
patch 8.2.1771: synIDattr() cannot get the value of ctermul

Problem:    synIDattr() cannot get the value of ctermul.
Solution:   Add the "ul" value for "what". (closes #7037)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1771: synIDattr() cannot get the value of ctermul · vim/vim@391c362
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1771: synIDattr() cannot get the value of ctermul · vim/vim@391c362
attachments.text: Problem: synIDattr() cannot get the value of ctermul. Solution: Add the "ul" value for "what". (closes #7037)
